text: Richard Edmund Lyng (June 29, 1918 - February 1, 2003) was an American politician. As a Republican, he served as the United States Secretary of Agriculture between 1986 and 1989 under the Ronald Reagan administration. Lyng died of complications from Parkinson's disease in Modesto, California, on February 1, 2003. ==Other websites== Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:United States Secretaries of Agriculture Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard Edmund Lyng
